      • lockRead

        public void lockRead()
        Description copied from interface: GuardIF
        Locks the guard for read purposes. Waits until a read lock can be aquired.
        Specified by:
        lockRead in interface GuardIF

      • lockWrite

        public void lockWrite()
        Description copied from interface: GuardIF
        Locks the guard for write purposes. Waits until a write lock can be aquired.
        Specified by:
        lockWrite in interface GuardIF

      • yield

        public void yield()
        Description copied from interface: GuardIF
        Can be called when there is a long lasting lock. When other threads wait for lock aquiring these threads will be preferred executed. After these executions the current write lock is reestablished. Must not be implemented by every guard
        Specified by:
        yield in interface GuardIF

      • unlock

        public void unlock()

      • unlockRead

        public void unlockRead()
        Specified by:

        Specified by:

      • promoteLock

        public boolean promoteLock()
        Description copied from interface: GuardIF
        Promoted an existing read lock to an write lock. Might wait until other readers unlock.
        Specified by:
        promoteLock in interface GuardIF
        Returns:
        true when the promotion did happen, false when the lock status didn't change
